title: $500,000 Gets You A 170-Foot-Tall Ketchup Bottle In Illinois
teaser: The condiment container towers above the former Brooks Old Original and Tangy Ketchup factory. The company moved out decades ago; now the space is for sale. It doesn't come with a giant side of fries.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
